tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.2.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: The Bridge At Kang So Ri
programme.sub-title: The Bridge At Kang So Ri
programme.desc: Harm and Mac board a plane bound for Korea to investigate charges that GI's shot and killed civilians during the Korean War.

programme.title: JAG: People vs SECNAV
programme.desc: After an incident in Iraq claims the lives of innocent civilians, SecNav is brought up on charges of war crimes in International Court, and Harm and Mac must defend him. Meanwhile, during a trip to the arcade, little A.J. goes missing.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Coming Home
programme.desc: A marine’s killing in Iraq has ramifications for JAG stateside as Harm helps the soldier’s family with a media onslaught, and Bud and Mac investigate the failure of his flack vest.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Fighting Words
programme.desc: A general’s comments about Islam during a church service pit Harm and Mac against each other as a court-martial hearing examines whether those remarks were a danger to national security.(n)

programme.title: JAG: One Big Boat
programme.desc: When a Naval Academy sailing team gets caught in a squall and a team member drowns, Mac and Turner must determine if their driven commander willingly put his crew at risk.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Death At The Mosque
programme.desc: Vukovic is sent to Iraq to defend a Marine who was caught on tape killing a seemingly innocent Iraqi civilian.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Gator Done
programme.desc: Team Scorpion heads to the bayou to track down a cagey alligator in order to stop a deadly mosquito-borne virus, and Paige teaches Walter the concept of the 'white lie.'.

programme.title: Scorpion: Foul Balls
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must use their high IQs to win a softball game when the homeland director challenges, with all of their future government contracts on the line.

programme.title: Scorpion: Fish Filet
programme.desc: In order to save the lives of three judges, Sylvester goes undercover in federal prison but Team Scorpion must break him out when his life is threatened. Kevin Weisman guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Robots
programme.desc: Walter, Cabe, and Happy are trapped with the crew in a top-secret submarine when an explosion sends it to the bottom of the ocean with limited oxygen.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Super Fun Guys
programme.desc: Team Scorpion goes undercover on the "Super Fun Guy" movie set in Kazakstan in order to disable a Soviet-era nuclear missile being sold by terrorists.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Tech, Drugs, and Rock 'n Roll
programme.desc: Walter's attempt to "normalize" goes horribly wrong when a nefarious virus is uploaded to his computer.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Crazy Train
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must stop a sabotaged runaway subway train with Paige and Ralph on board. Also, in his attempt to impress Happy, Toby has his first boxing match.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Bullet Proof
programme.desc: Andy’s romance with Det. Luke Callaghan gets complicated when he chooses her for a special assignment -serving a search warrant for a bullet lodged in the head of a witness to murder.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Hot & Bothered
programme.desc: A severe heat wave wreaks havoc on the city, forcing the rookies to work around the clock to keep the peace. In the midst of the chaos, Andy discovers that a serial rapist may have resurfaced to prey on vulnerable teenage girls.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Honour Roll
programme.desc: After their High School Outreach assignment goes awry, Andy and Chris stumble on the victim of avicious beating behind a nightclub.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Girlfriend of the Year
programme.desc: After a routine speed trap leads to a messy accident on a city highway, Chris and Gail find one of the cars mysteriously empty and quickly realize that itslicense plate matches the one being broadcast in a citywide “Amber Alert”.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Big Nickel
programme.desc: Andy’s attempt to avoid Swarek is thwarted whenbothare assigned to a prisoner transport. When things go awry and theinmate breaks loose, the two officers are led on a cat-and-mouse foot chase through the meandering woods.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: To Serve or Protect
programme.desc: What was to be a routine day for Andy is abruptly put on holdwhen herex-copper father, Tommy, confesses that he might have committed a serious crime during one of his alcohol-induced blackouts.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Llanfyliln House Part 2
programme.desc: Whatever was making itself known to the team earlier, continues in this episode as\nsomething seems to be following Yvette from the shadows.

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Moat House Part 1
programme.desc: This time Yvette and her team ventures into the dark abyss of the cellars under this large\ncountry house. Without exception every member of the team experience something\nunexplained as the darkness starts to come to life.

programme.title: Most Haunted: SECRET LOCATION PT2
programme.desc: Most Haunted's deadliest investigation, Part 2. Spirits emerging, team's resolve tested as darkness envelops. Growing fear, team's safety at stake. Can they continue?(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Armely Mills Cottage
programme.desc: The cottage on the site of Armley Mills is said to be full of paranormal activity so Karl decides to enter, alone and witnesses something that is eager to grab his attention.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Beaumanor Hall
programme.desc: Karl ventures, alone, to the upper floors of this large mansion and id stalked by something that wants to be heard.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Bishton Hall
programme.desc: Yvette takes Glen and Mary into the incredibly haunted Bishton Hall. They start in the upper floors and work their way down to the cellars, but is something following them.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Bishton Hall P1
programme.desc: Stuart investigates the main house and seems to be pulled in different directions from an unexplained energy.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Bishton Hall P2
programme.desc: Karl ventures down into the cellars of this large country house and soon comes under attack from an unseen force.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Borwick Hall P1
programme.desc: Karl enters Borwick Hall for the first time as he investigates the upper floors.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Well of Horror
programme.desc: TAPS is joined by Jason's daughter, Haily, on two cases; The Shanley Hotel in Napanoch, New York and Old Fort Niagara, in Youngstown, New York. Both cases involve a gruesome death that took place at a well, instigating paranormal activity.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Children in the Attic
programme.desc: One of the oldest yacht clubs in the USA is also one of the most haunted! A mother and her son are entangled in phenomena involving a frightening family from the past with a strange story to tell.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Paranormal Politics
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads down South to help two different families find some closure. First stop is Baton Rouge, Louisiana to investigate the Old State Capital Building, which has endured theCivil War and a congressman's death.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 9
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Tunnels of Terror
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Lockport, New York to investigate an underworld of tunnels. It holds a mystery of possible murder, multiple deaths and frightening phenomena. What stories do the spirits of Lockport Caves want to tell?(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Devil Take the Hindmost
programme.desc: Dylan and Rev Bem help a peaceful society to stand up to their would-be slavers. They have to be careful because if Dylan teaches them to kill, their kids will be born knowing it.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Honey Offering
programme.desc: Dylan attempts to bring peace to two different Nietzschean prides by escorting the princess of one to her arranged marriage to the prince of the other.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.sub-title: Tunnel at the End of the Light
programme.desc: With fifty parties on board, Dylan hosts the signing of the New Commonwealth charter, but soon discovers there are intruders intent on stopping the signing.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Beka and Tyr are taken over by the energy from a dimensional tunnel. Dylan, Trance and Harper must save them before they destroy the ship.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Shards of Rimni
programme.desc: Dylan is framed for murder and must clear his name while finding the pieces of a vase said to grant the owner the "blessings of the cosmos.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Mad to Be Saved
programme.desc: The crew rescues a group of refugees, only to discover they have been subject to government experiments and are extremely unstable.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Cui Bono
programme.desc: Beka's uncle runs for office in the New Commonwealth, but an assassination attempt causes the crew to act as his security.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Lone and Level Sands
programme.desc: When the Andromeda is attacked by space pirates, they are rescued by a long-lost spaceship from Earth.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.37
programme.desc: Parents allegedly renege on owed money for son's wedding after not being invited/Woman sues child's father for false domestic violence accusation upon discovering love note to wife in Tunisia.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.213
programme.desc: Woman loans $5,000+ to online acquaintance for his divorce lawyer; he claims it's a gift. Another sues ex-fiancé for unpaid motorcycle loan and demands medical bill reimbursement for daughter's ex.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.89
programme.desc: Three teenagers conspire to steal 8,000 dollars from a senior citizen to buy new equipment for their band; one of the thieves is the woman’s own grandson/The proceeds from selling an engagement ring on eBay divides ex- lovers.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.11
programme.desc: A daycare provider sues for slander after parents claim she was unlicensed, negligent, and had alcohol on the premises/Two boxers and a German Shepherd allegedly jump on a car and scratch the paint; ex-friends fight over damages.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.54
programme.desc: Man sues mother of his child for totaled 1999 Nissan Ultima value and pawn retrieval costs; she claims car ownership/Former best friends dispute unpaid rent, bills for shared townhouse amid single motherhood and break-up.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.124
programme.desc: Man alleges vandalism and gang assault at family party/Man blames ex-girlfriend for inability to repay $9,000 car loan due to cheating and abandonment.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.88
programme.desc: An alleged loan to pay off a sports gambling debt is disputed by ex- friends who disagree about whether or not they dated/A woman is suing her former friend for an alleged loan to catch-up on his delinquent truck payments.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.153
programme.desc: An incident of road rage escalates when a woman blows a kiss and laughs as she crosses the path of an angry, frustrated driver.\t\t\t\r\nClaiming she was kicked out illegally, a woman refuses to pay for rent and living expenses.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.34
programme.desc: Mother falsely accused of child abuse by ex-husband, his mother, and roommate/Case dismissed after 17 abuse reports/Man sues great nephew for jeep damage; nephew claims fun spin caused crash.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.250
programme.desc: A teenager's friend faces accusations of drinking, driving, and crashing a stolen golf cart; he blames the teenager's mother for providing alcohol. Two brothers fight over damages to a home allegedly caused by domestic violence.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.180
programme.desc: A 66-year-old analyst for the U.S. Department of Defense claims he\t\t\t\r\nwas intimate with a 27-year-old sports bar worker and that she owes\t\t\t\r\nhim money. She denies his claims.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.166
programme.desc: Woman faces lawsuit for unpaid bail from speeding with suspended license. Man sues ex for car loan balance; she countersues for job loss.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.19
programme.desc: Man alleges ex-girlfriend ordered escort attack in bar; she denies and countersues for dirt bike balance, car vandalism, and harassment/Trashed hotel room after 18th birthday sparks damages lawsuit.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.138
programme.desc: Pit bull terrier attacks family in park; owner accused of intoxication and starting fight. Woman loans man thousands after rehab; he claims affair and gifts.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.111
programme.desc: A woman admits to wielding a knife but not to scratching her ex- stepbrother’s car/A woman demands compensation after a young house sitter allegedly damages her home and belongings when she broke the rules and brought her cat along.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: With the dining room transformed into an Italian bistro, all eight chefs learn that they will participate in the beloved blind taste test challenge, gelato edition. With two tables of 12 patrons, the chefs rush to see who finishes first.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The seven remaining chefs are called down to the dining room to discover two ice dancers performing a routine. Chef Ramsay explains ice dancing can be romantic, just as dessert can be. For their challenge they must cook an extraordinary dessert.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: When the losing team is unable to identify some commonplace items in a taste-test challenge, chef Gordon Ramsay orders a grotesque taste-testing practise that turns several stomachs.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The remaining seven chefs must present a meal for a wedding reception at the restaurant. The teams race to make sure they do not disappoint the newlyweds or the hungry bridal party.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: One of the chefs changes teams and each team must prepare three lobster dishes in an hour. Another chef faces elimination and has to leave at the end of the day.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The remaining six chefs must turn leftovers into meals in 30 minutes, and the winning team gets a chance for revenge on chef Ramsay. Poor communication may signal the end for one contestant.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay combines the remaining five chefs into one team; the chefs must compete head-to-head with individual dishes to impress trendsetters. Two contestants have a heated power-struggle and chef Ramsay makes a heartfelt offer.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The remaining three chefs must transform classic American dishes into entrées worthy of fine dining; the contestants' mothers vote on their favourite entrées without knowing who made them; chef Ramsay chooses the two finalists.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Purdy’s dominates the West Coast, but is struggling to make an impression elsewhere. To boost sales, the Chocolate Queen travels the country, working in disguise in her own stores and factory floors.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Canlan Ice Sports Corp is the largest private owner of sports facilities in North America. CEO Joey St Aubin admits their prices are higher than local municipal rinks, but believes his company offers a premium service and better ice quality.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Pizza Pizza CEO Paul Goddard goes undercover in the nation’s number one pizza mega brand, and learns that making dough and delivering pizza serves up some challenges he never imagined.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The Victorian Order of Nurses takes the pressure off hospitals by providing care for people in their own homes. Hundreds of rival companies compete for cash and customers.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Michael Sneyd, CEO of mega resort business Skyline International Development, goes undercover to get creative with the employees at the foot of the chain and take their ideas to new heights.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Silva became CEO of Checkers & Rallys fast food restaurants five years ago, and immediately focused on growing the business at any cost. So he is going undercover to find even more ways to drive sales and please his guests.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Toronto Transit Commission (TTC) City Councillor and TTC Chair Karen Stintz goes undercover inside the country's largest mass transit system to get her hands dirty with some of the toughest and grittiest jobs.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Now Serving Mrs. Pizarro
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy discuss what they will do with their severance pay once the company is sold, but have to put the discussion on hold while they repo a hovercraft golf cart from a snooty golfer.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Taken for a Ride
programme.desc: A professional stunt driver slips through Froy and Sonia's grasp, sending them on a violent high-speed chase. Matt offends a pretty RO who seeks womanly revenge, and Froy and Carlos go undercover at a lowrider show.

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Final Finale
programme.desc: On this special one-hour series finale of Operation Repo, the team is scrambling to get ready for the huge Yacht repo to secure the sale of the company and the distribution of their severance packages, while still going after everyday repos.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Hidden Cars and Higher Powers
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy get some help from a friendly gardener that leads them to discover a car hidden in the backyard. Next, Matt and Froy go on another repo to repossess from a preacher that believes it would be blasphemy to repo his car.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Rolling Away
programme.desc: First, Lou, Sonia, and Froy have to push away a debtor while trying to push a classic car up a hill and onto the flatbed. And later, Matt and Froy head out on a repo for a BMW, but when the camera guy refuses to leave the car and Matt's lunch starts to...(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Matt's Back
programme.desc: Froy and Mike, the new guy, repo a car at a paintball range. When the scene gets out of control, Matt swoops in out of nowhere and saves the day. Then, Sonia and Froy repo a high-end luxury sedan from a snooty pair of Brits in the high-rent district.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Burgers, Bottles, and Hustlers
programme.desc: Lou and Sonia repo a compact sedan from a trio of gun-wielding, bottle-breaking gangsta gals. Then, Matt and Froy get some fast food when they deal with an irate burger-slinger who won't honor Matt's order for his car.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Strapped on the Court
programme.desc: Matt and Froy have to choose between the job and their lives when they're confronted by a dozen gun-toting basketball players. Then, Lou and Sonia have to crash a night-time family reunion to get their car.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Role-players and Blade Swayers
programme.desc: Lou, Matt, and Froy get interrupted on a routine job by a registered owner with an unregistered blade. Then, Matt and Froy head out to the country to reclaim a Prius from a quintet of socially maladapted role-players.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Caught with Their Pants Down
programme.desc: Sonia and Froy's relationship takes a strange turn on a repo that puts them face-to-face with two strangers caught with their pants down. Then, Lou and Lyndah head to a remote ranch where they confront a duo of indecent roughnecks.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Honor Rolling Away
programme.desc: Sonia and Lyndah find themselves at a local University trying to reclaim a car from a not-so-honorable honor roll student with a squeaky voice. Then, Matt and Sonia are tasked with snagging a tricked-out race car from two vested thugs armed with golf club.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Tazed and Amazed
programme.desc: Matt and Froy need to call in the cops to help out with an inebriated old-timer armed with a tazer. Then, on a journey for a Journey, Lou and Froy battle with a bowler. And finally, Froy and Lyndah deal with a back-peddling super-sized owner of a Nissan A.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Intoxicated Marina Idiots
programme.desc: First, Lou and Sonia are on a hunt for a 2007 Porsche & a 2008 Audi from the same drug dealing debtor. Next, Matt and Froy pry a truck from a group of intoxicated idiots at a marina. And finally, Matt and Lou hit up an upscale Glendale neighborhood to...(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Bag Ladies
programme.desc: Russell realizes the cost of dating a 'bag lady,' while Adam experiences the social peril of yielding to Jennifer's wishes and sporting a 'man bag.'.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Old School Jeff
programme.desc: Jeff is given an opportunity to 'live it up' during a night out on the town, landing Russell in hot water and Adam to reflect on the details surrounding his impending nuptials.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Fix-Ups and Downs
programme.desc: Jennifer and Audrey practice their match-making skills and inadvertently end up date-less while Adam and Jeff score financial gain in the process. Meanwhile, Russell tries a new tactic at 'fixing himself up.'.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: A Visit from Fay
programme.desc: A visit from Adam's free-spirited mother puts Jennifer's patience to the test and teaches Russell an embarrassing lesson about 'art'. Meanwhile, Jeff and Audrey find themselves enjoying alternative forms of entertainment.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Beating the System
programme.desc: When Jeff and Audrey learn their surrogate is pregnant, both of their lives change. Meanwhile, Timmy takes on the responsibility of wedding planner for Adam and Jennifer.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Jeff Photo
programme.desc: When an old photo of Jeff appears in an art gallery, he decides it's time to make some changes in his life. Meanwhile, Russell experiences a slump with women until he sees a familiar face.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Power Couple
programme.desc: Jeff is threatened when Audrey gets a raise and makes almost as much as he does. Meanwhile, Russell enlists Timmy to find out what Liz sees in another man.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Double Down
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey panic when they are told they might be having twins. Meanwhile, Russell throws a citizenship party for Timmy to impress a girl.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cheating
programme.desc: Audrey tries to persuade Jeff to eat healthier when he is diagnosed with high cholesterol, but he can’t help sneaking around with Brenda for unhealthy food.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Scavenger Hunt
programme.desc: To try to show his care and interest in their relationship, Jeff sends Audrey on a scavenger hunt, as suggested by Adam. Russell thinks Jennifer has a sex tape and enlists Timmy’s help in finding it.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Last of the Red Hat Lovers
programme.sub-title: The Last of the Red Hat Lovers
programme.desc: Russell books a cruise that he thinks is filled with 'red hot' ladies but instead, it's filled with ladies from the Red Hat society. Meanwhile, Timmy tries to help Jeff and Audrey settle an argument.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Dirty Talk
programme.desc: Russell tries to get out of his marriage to an overly enthused Liz, who tries to make it work, while Jeff attempts to engage Audrey in dirty talk.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Bros Before Nodes
programme.desc: Worried about getting his father's approval, Russell gets Liz all dolled up to meet him.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Audrey Is Dumb
programme.desc: Jeff celebrates Audrey's inability to talk after her node removal surgery. Russell gets Timmy to fire an employee for him, and Adam discovers he's only getting free stuff because of his good looks.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A Family Affair
programme.desc: Dog likes to say, "The apple doesn't fall far from the tree," and this is a hunt where that is true. So will Dog be able to use one family member's troubled ways to catch another one in trouble with the law?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Training Day
programme.desc: While the team tries to handle the bond that newcomer Alysin wrote incorrectly, sparks are flying between Beth and Duane Lee when he questions Beth's decision to go on the hunt without Dog leading the charge!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cutting the Apron Strings
programme.desc: Two different young men both have a bad habit of missing their court dates. Looking over their files Dog senses that they have another trait in common, both are a little too tied to their mothers.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bonds of Love
programme.desc: Dog and Beth are finally getting married! They've been together for more than ten years but Dog is determined, as he puts it, to "marry his common law wife the Christian way.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: To Love and to Cherish
programme.desc: Dog and Beth are off to the Big Island for their wedding. They hope to relax for a few days but it turns out Leland has a fugitive he needs to catch and despite the time limit, neither Dog nor Beth can resist the opportunity to catch a fugitive.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bustin' with Justin
programme.desc: Dog and the team must deal with misleading informants, belligerent boaters, and angry drunks when they go after Kimberly, a traffic offender with over 20 violations. And if that isn't enough, Dog has another problem - Duane Lee is sick.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Run Fugitive, Run
programme.desc: When the team hunts for Steven, a fugitive with a history of domestic abuse, they seek help from his girlfriend, who's been a victim of his abuse. Meanwhile, Beth trains for a 5K race to help raise awareness about domestic abuse.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Vegas or Bust
programme.desc: Dog is going to be the keynote speaker at the annual Profession Bail Agents convention in Las Vegas, but before he leaves he's got to clear two cases from his docket - Heidi and Stephanie.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Playing Possum
programme.desc: Tim's got a big problem. Owen has failed to appear in court. He's on bond for serious drug charges and now Tim could lose $30,000 if he doesn't catch Owen. With Dog's help he tries to track down the co-signer but they come up dry.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rainy Day Woman
programme.desc: It's been raining for days and the team is going a little stir crazy, but Dog has the cure; a good hunt. Maui has failed to appear on a drug charge and the team has just one lead. She was recently spotted during a bust at a local chop shop garage.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Ticket to Ride
programme.desc: Dog decides it's time to outfit the Da Kine crew with new SUVs. After a quick visit to their local dealership, they go after Jasmine, a woman whose criminal record includes over 37 arrests for everything from drug promotion to assault.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mother Knows Best
programme.desc: Dog has two fugitives to catch, and he gets help from the unlikeliest sources - the fugitives' mothers. First, Ginger's mother wants to revoke her daughter's bond. Then, Brandon's mother decides to revoke his bond because Brandon has an ice habit.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Sadie's Choice
programme.desc: Willie takes Sadie on a tour of a local college in hopes of convincing her to stay nearby after her impending high school graduation.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Children of the Cornbread
programme.desc: When the Robertson brothers debate which of their wives makes the best cornbread, it escalates into a full-on cornbread cook off. Meanwhile, when Jep, Martin, and Godwin play a practical joke on Uncle Si, it ends up being Si who has the last laugh.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Whole Lotta Bull
programme.desc: The guys enjoy a one-day rodeo fantasy camp where they learn the ins and outs of riding, roping and clowning.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Here Comes the Son
programme.desc: After leaving school to pursue music, Jase feels that Reed needs some structure in his life, so he hires him to take his place at Duck Commander.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Jerky Boys
programme.desc: A decision to try and make some duck jerky leads the boys to Godwin's garage and a minibike race. Phil and Kay have made Willie the executor of their will, and Phil wants to show Willie what he and his brothers will inherit when he and Kay pass away.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Going Si-ral
programme.desc: Si discovers Youtube, and, after watching a series of instructional videos, decides he can make something better. John Luke totals Willie's truck, and Willie realizes he may be raising the two worst drivers in all of Louisiana.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack-O-Lantern
programme.desc: The Robertsons host a Halloween event at Duck Commander, where they all come together to transform the warehouse into a "scarehouse." Everyone dresses up and Willie desperately tries to be the scariest, but none of the kids are afraid of him.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: O Little Town of West Monroe
programme.sub-title: O Little Town of West Monroe
programme.desc: The Robertsons perform a live nativity for their Church for Christmas, so the wives organize rehearsals to ensure that they pull off a great event. However, rehearsals get off to a bumpy start as the guys can't stop sharing their opinions.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Boomerang Becca
programme.desc: When Rebecca returns home from her internship in Los Angeles, the Robertson family plans a big surprise party to welcome her back. Meanwhile, when Uncle Si gets sick, he seeks the help of Ms. Kay to take care of him.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Willie's Number Two
programme.desc: When Willie is looking to hire a new assistant, Korie insists he interviews her cousin, JD. Meanwhile, when Uncle Si spends the day over at Phil and Kay's, Jep stops by with the kids to keep them away from Jessica, who has taken ill.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Life of Si
programme.desc: After seeing footage Jep shot using a GoPro, Si decides he wants to use the camera to record a day in his life. But when Si gets on the guys nerves while they're hunting, they kick him and his GoPros out of the blind.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: From Duck 'til Dawn
programme.desc: When the duck guys have to pull an all-nighter to finish some work, Willie decides he wants to join them. But when a dying smoke detector distracts them from their work, Jase and Willie head off to disarm it.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Burger Commander
programme.desc: After visiting a popular burger restaurant, Willie and Jase get into a debate over which of them cooks the best burger, prompting them to challenge one another to a cooking contest.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: G.I. Si
programme.desc: When Willie and Jase argue over an old G.I. Joe toy, it leads them into a debate over who would make a better soldier. To settle the score, Willie and Jase head out to the woods with their friends and children for a paintball match.(n)

programme.title: Area Q
programme.desc: After his son disappears a journalist goes to Brazil to investigate, where he discovers close encounter sightings that have taken place in a region known as Area Q, where he may uncover the mystery surrounding his son's disappearance.

programme.title: Cell
programme.desc: Chaos descends when a mysterious pulse turns cell phone users into vicious predators. Desperate to reunite with his family, Clay teams up with survivors to battle the hordes of relentless killers! Feat: Samuel L. Jackson & John Cusack.(n)

programme.title: Ultrasound
programme.desc: A dark puzzle-box sci-fi in the vein of ‘Memento’ and ‘Primer’.(n)

programme.title: Automata
programme.desc: Jacq Vaucan (Antonio Banderas, 'The Mask of Zorro') is an insurance agent of ROC robotics corporation who investigates cases of robots violating their primary protocols against altering themselves.(n)

programme.title: Insomnia
programme.desc: Academy Award winners Robin Williams, Al Pacino and Hilary Swank star in a thriller set in the land of the midnight sun, where the mind of even a tough cop can be threatened by Insomnia.

programme.title: Lesbian Vampire Killers
programme.desc: Jimmy and Fletch are a couple of losers on a hiking trip, who wander into a feeding ground for a band of fang-baring vampire babes. With a busload of hot history students to protect, they'll try to survive the night.(n)

programme.title: Draft Day
programme.desc: It's NFL Draft Day and General Manager Sonny Weaver Jr. (Kevin Costner) faces the biggest decision of his life – the #1 pick. Will he pull off the draft of a lifetime or lose it all?(n)

programme.title: Kill The Irishman
programme.desc: Oscar®-winner Christopher Walken, Val Kilmer, and Ray Stevenson star in KILL THE IRISHMAN, the true story of a tough Irish thug working for mobsters in Cleveland during the 1970s.(n)

programme.title: White Vengeance
programme.desc: White Vengeance tells the story of two brothers contending for supremacy during the fall of the Qin Dynasty, which ruled Imperial China from 221 to 206 BC.(n)

programme.title: Recoil
programme.desc: A cop turns vigilante after his family is murdered, exacting vengeance on the killers - and then on all criminals who have slipped through the system.(n)

programme.title: Seized
programme.desc: A former special forces agent's son is kidnapped and must now wipe out three dangerous crime syndicates, if he wants to see his son alive again.(n)

programme.title: Holiday Wishes
programme.desc: Britney, a rich, spoiled child, and Rachel, an orphan, switch bodies after a visit to the mall with Santa Claus. Each girl wakes up as the other - Britney is in the orphanage, and Rachel is at Britney's family's mansion.

programme.title: K9 Christmas: Scoot & Kassie's Christmas Adventure
programme.desc: Kassie rescues Scoot, a former K-9 police dog, who becomes her best friend. But when two men turn up to work at the bank that Kassie's dad (Luke Perry) manages she finds out they are crooks with plans to get their hands on all the money and ruin Christmas.(n)

programme.title: One Bad Christmas
programme.desc: Big Earl is the owner of a Christmas tree lot, he has a big heart and big visions. The week before Christmas, his son Derrick, trying to prove to his dad that he is a success, gets into trouble and puts the survival of his dad’s business in jeopardy.(n)

programme.title: A Christmas Village
programme.desc: To save her reputation, Piper Jensen, a public relations genius and owner of her own PR company, agrees to work for the owner of a failing Santa’s Village and discovers love and how magical Christmas is after all.(n)

programme.title: A Bulldog For Christmas
programme.desc: Becky really hates Christmas. But when she is magically transformed into a cute bulldog, she has to learn the meaning of Christmas and get into the holiday spirit or she may never be changed back. An entertaining Christmas film for the whole family.(n)

programme.title: Living in Fear
programme.desc: A newly married bride travels to her husband's hometown for the reading of his father's will. When she discovers that the townspeople suspect her husband of a murder committed twenty years ago, she has her doubts about the man she's committed her life to.

programme.title: Grandma Dearest
programme.desc: A psychotic woman goes to murderous lengths to protect her relationship with her new grandchildren.(n)

programme.title: Evil Doctor
programme.desc: Expectant parents Aubrey and Matt find their lives haunted, and their marriage tested, by an unhinged OB GYN with a mysterious past and who is after their child.(n)

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark
programme.sub-title: Mary Higgins Clark: All Around The Town
programme.desc: An innocent girl is kidnapped and held hostage for two years causing her to develop multiple personalities and making her the number one suspect when her English professor is brutally murdered.(n)

programme.title: Road to Paloma
programme.desc: After avenging the rape and murder of his mother, a man (Jason Momoa) dodges the FBI while traveling across the West to spread her ashes.(n)

programme.title: Deepwater Horizon
programme.desc: Chief electronics technician Mike Williams (Mark Wahlberg) and other crew members fight for survival when the Deepwater Horizon drilling rig explodes on April 20, 2010, in the Gulf of Mexico.(n)

programme.title: Survivor
programme.desc: Framed for a terrorist bombing, a foreign service officer (Milla Jovovich) must dodge a top assassin (Pierce Brosnan), while racing against time to thwart a deadly plot.(n)

programme.title: Wrangler: Wrangler
programme.desc: Ben is intent on building a life with Alice although he faces some competition from local cowboy Jack. When Alice's father dies, and a creditor plots to seize her land, Ben leaps to her defense - an act that could lead to their marriage or his funeral.(n)

programme.title: Hondo
programme.desc: John Wayne plays Hondo Lane, a cavalry rider who becomes the protector of Angie Lowe as well as a father figure to her boy, Johnny. Angie, determinedly awaiting the return of her husband, refuses to leave their homestead despite the growing danger.(n)

programme.title: Gone With The West
programme.desc: After being framed, a cowboy is sent to jail. After his time is served, he leaves with vengeance in his heart. Soon he meets a young Native American woman and together they go to settle their score with a small town and its corrupt leader.(n)

programme.title: Blue Steel
programme.desc: U.S. marshal John Carruthers observes a robbery and Sheriff Jake thinks he may be the culprit. Meanwhile the town's leading citizen is planning to rob everybody blind.(n)

programme.title: Legendary
programme.desc: Cal Chetley is a bright, engaging, undersized fifteen year-old who's been picked on most of his life. Cal joins his high school wrestling team in the hopes his brother will train him. More importantly, Cal uses wrestling as the tool to reunite his family.

programme.title: Wish Upon a Star: Wish Upon a Star (1996)
programme.desc: In this cult classic, younger sister Hayley Wheaton (Danielle Harris) wishes to switch places with her popular older sister Alexia (Katherine Heigl) and the two bickering siblings awaken to find the wish has come true.(n)

programme.title: The Chaperone
programme.desc: Ray’s been asked to chaperone a school trip with his daughter Sally’s class. When characters from Ray’s criminal past believe he stole the loot from a bank they robbed, Ray will do whatever it takes to keep his daughter and her class out of harms way.(n)

programme.title: K9 Legend Of The Lost Gold
programme.desc: When Kassie and her friends stumble across an old, broken pocket watch they begin an unexpected journey to unlock the secret of the legendary Garrison Gold. They'll have to solve clues to find the lost treasure.(n)

programme.title: For The Love Of Benji
programme.desc: Benji is back! En route to a vacation in Greece Benji becomes separated from the family in Athens, Benji finds himself on the run from an assortment of international spies seeking an energy scientist, who has been working on a secret formula.(n)

programme.title: Behaving Badly
programme.desc: Teenager Rick Stevens has a crush on Nina Pennington. They form a friendship and embark on a rock n' roll journey together while Nina deals with her overbearing boyfriend, Kevin. Starring: Nat Wolff, Selena Gomez, Mary-Louise Parker.

programme.title: Airplane Mode
programme.desc: Horny American teenagers fly to Australia for sex at the social media convention in Sydney. Will Logan survive his fear of flying? Will the pilots survive passengers not using airplane mode? Will anyone survive? Feat: Logan Paul.(n)

programme.title: Fanboys
programme.desc: A group of Star Wars fans travel to Skywalker Ranch to steal a copy of 'The Phantom Menace,' so that their terminally ill friend can see it before its release in theaters several months down the line.(n)

programme.title: Mad Money
programme.desc: Deep inside the most secure bank in America, three desperate women from very different worlds cook up the most unlikely heist of the century: Smuggle out millions of dollars in worn-out currency headed for a Federal Reserve shredder every day.(n)

programme.title: Just My Luck
programme.desc: A mild-mannered jeweller's assistant gets in over his head when he spends a day at the races.

programme.title: Miss London Ltd.
programme.desc: Arthur Askey stars as a man trying to save his flagging escort agency. A new partner suggests getting some new girls in, just in time for the soldiers' leave.(n)

programme.title: Love, Life and Laughter
programme.desc: A young man of royalty falls in love with the daughter of a pub owner, but is compelled by duty to return to the throne.(n)

programme.title: The Naked Truth
programme.desc: Four high profile personalities band together to bump off a tabloid magazine publisher who threatens to expose their dark secrets.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Still Life/The Little People of Killany Woods/The Misfortune Cookie
programme.sub-title: Still Life/The Little People of Killany Woods/The Misfortune Cookie
programme.desc: Dan finds mystic photos in antique camera/Irishman's leprechaun tales turn real/Critic's end foretold by fortune cookies.

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Profile in Silver/Button, Button
programme.desc: A time traveling researcher attending the assassination of John F. Kennedy impulsively changes history/An unhappy couple is given an unusual offer. Push a button on a box and someone they don't know will die, but they will get $200,000.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Need to Know/Red Snow
programme.desc: Edward investigates town madness, discovers individual secret/KGB agent uncovers Stalin's exiles alive, dead drained of blood in Siberia.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Take My Life... Please!//Devil's Alphabet/The Library
programme.sub-title: Take My Life... Please!//Devil's Alphabet/The Library
programme.desc: A comedian killed by his rival finds himself in a strange stage show; something's off/In Victorian England, Cambridge grads are bound by an oath even in death/A woman starts at an odd library.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Shadow Play/Grace Note
programme.desc: A condemned man, Adam Grant, insists that everything and everyone around him is a dream: one that he can't wake up from/An aspiring opera singer gets an inspiring glimpse of her future, courtesy of a dying wish by her youngest sister.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: A day in Beaumont/The Last Defender of Camelot
programme.sub-title: A day in Beaumont/The Last Defender of Camelot
programme.desc: In the 1950s a flying saucer crashes on Earth. The crash is seen by a couple but no one believes them/Sir Lancelot seeks the help of the sleeping Merlin in one final battle. But he soon finds himself facing off against the revived wizard.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Resistance
programme.desc: Helen and Henry break into a government abnormal research facility called SCIU - only to find it is run by Tesla. Biggie and Will deal with an annoying abnormal named Galvo.

programme.title: Sanctuary: Homecoming
programme.desc: Will's trip to Liberia turns bad when he suffers a head trauma from an attack. The trauma brings up powerful memories about his mothers death and the inadequacies of his father. Magnus deals with be-winged scam artist.

programme.title: Sanctuary: Homecoming
programme.desc: Will's trip to Liberia turns bad when he suffers a head trauma from an attack. The trauma brings up powerful memories about his mothers death and the inadequacies of his father. Magnus deals with be-winged scam artist.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Icebreaker
programme.desc: Henry and Declan lead a team to rescue a crew of a Russian icebreaker and the abnormal passengers.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Fugue
programme.desc: FBI Agent Abby Corrigan's life is endangered after she is suddenly attacked by an unfamiliar abnormal during an investigation. Magnus and Will's heated debate over the best way to help Abby threatens to permanently alter their relationship.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Chimera
programme.desc: There is a sentient organic nanite causing havoc in the computer system in the Sanctuary. Magnus and Tesla connect their minds to the system in an effort to isolate the nanite. They find Adam Worth instead.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Acolyte
programme.desc: A radical group of abnormal beings plan a terrorist attack with the goal of starting a war between surface dwellers and hollow Earth inhabitants. To Magnus' disbelief, Addison, at the NSA, has proof of Biggie's leadership of the group.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: The Depths
programme.desc: When Magnus and Will learn of a plan to capture very rare and dangerous Abnormal, they travel to a remote cave to prevent then hunt.(n)
